summary: This bill, the Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act of 2025, amends the Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009. It focuses on improving collaboration between the Secretary of Commerce, state, local governments, and Indian Tribes on vulnerability assessments, research planning, and related activities concerning ocean acidification. The bill also updates definitions within the original act, modifies the composition of the Advisory Board, mandates the development of a policy for engagement with Indian Tribes, and makes technical corrections to the original legislation.
